job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: With our recent close of our Series A funding, Molecule is hiring mid-to-senior-level full-stack engineers. As a member of our team, you'll help us design, build, and deliver the very best commodities-trading software on the planet.You'll get to build production grade software using Ruby on Rails, React, Go, Python, Postgres, Docker, Kubernetes, and moreâ because we don't shy away from using cool tech in production. As a member of our team, you'll find yourself doing things the right way, most of the time.The problem domain is complex, and if you have experience (or interest) in finance, trading, statistics, or calculus, this could be the gig for you. Sound interesting? Here's some more about the jobResponsibilitiesDesign, develop, and test new features for Molecule's next-gen trading platformWrite efficient, maintainable, and reusable code and participate in and support the full continuous delivery pipelineWrite and maintain unit and feature tests, and review other team members' code and testsHelp eliminate tech debtCollaborate with and mentor team membersLearn new technologies (and help your teammates learn them too)Help the company grow by contributing to open source projects, and by representing Molecule well within the developer communityExperience & QualificationsRequirementsBS or MS in Computer Science or related field2 to 5+ years of experience developing full-stack applications with Ruby on Rails, React, Go, Python or other open-source technologiesHigh level of proficiency with Ruby, React, SQL, and JavaScript/TypeScriptExperience with DevOps and with container (e.g. Docker) and container orchestration technologies (e.g. Kubernetes)Experience with asynchronous and high-volume transaction processingExperience with Agile software developmentA self-disciplined and task oriented approach to development, documentation and code structureWork in US time zonesNice to havesExperience in finance, or energy/commodities/equity tradingExperience with enterprise-grade software and high-security environmentsExperience working at a tech startupBenefitsMolecule has an awesome benefits packageâone that fits right in with the small company that we are. Benefits includeFull medical, dental, and vision insurance (99% company-paid)Life and AD&D (100% company-paid)No limit on paid vacation days (within reason)10 sick days$1500 every 18 months towards a BYOD policyAn environment matching our values.
